name: The North Face Utility Hybrid Hiker Tights - Women's
description: Your favourite tights, redesigned for the backcountry. Thoughtfully body-mapped construction puts durable stretch-woven panels in high-wear areas so you can hike through overgrown sections without snags, and stretchier knit fabric moves with you as you high-step over logs and across small creeks. Moisture-wicking fabric keeps you cool, dry and comfortable on even the hottest hikes, and pockets let you keep your phone and a snack close at hand.Body-mapped construction uses stretch-woven panels for abrasion resistance and knit panels for freedom of motion.FlashDry XD finish wicks moisture and speeds drying time.Wide waistband is comfortable under a backpack.Zippered hand and side pockets carry small essentials.Gusseted crotch lets you stretch and stride.
